meanings.definition: Cleaned or purified by a ritual or ceremony.
meanings.sent1: The sacred statue was lustrated before the ceremony.
meanings.sent2: The lustrated room gleamed with purity.
meanings.sent3: The lustrated water sparkled like diamonds under the sun.
meanings.sent4: Her lustrated soul shone with inner peace.
meanings.sent5: The lustrated robes of the priest seemed to glow with divine light.
